content: --द {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} one who gives food, one who supplies with bread or with any other means of subsistence; श्वा पिंडदस्य कुरुते गजपुंगवस्तु धीरं विलोकयति चाटुशतैश्च भुंक्ते <ls>Bh. 2. 31.</ls> {2} one who is qualified to give the funeral rice-balls to deceased ancestors; <ls>Y. 2. 132.</ls> (--दः {1} the nearest male relation who offers the funeral rice-ball. {2} a master, patron.
